reviewText: This is specific to the transfer.  In short, it is a disaster!  It looks like a really bad VHS was transferred to DVD.  It is scratchy, dark, shaky, etc.  I did give one extra star just because the movie is so awesome, but buyers definitely beware!
One of the best Roc Tien films, one of the most of memorable characters, the sfx is ridiculous but awesome none the less.

I loved the costumes and the sword fighting theres plenty use of wires here but it doesn't lend too much to the outrageous,for those who enjoy acobatic martial arts this movie for the price is a outstanding deal
